    public class BankManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    for implementing this class we used singleton pattern for managing our players' moneys balance

    Team5

      void addBalance(long balance)

      this method can get the current amount of moneys that player spend until now
      static BankManager getInstance()
      it will be make a instance from this class if there is not any object of this class in memory if(instance == null) { instance = new BankManager(); balance = AccountConstants.DEFAULT_BALANCE; currentBalance = 0; } return instance;
      void resetCurrentBalance()
      this method make the total amount that have been used by player to zero

      • getInstance

        public static BankManager getInstance()
        it will be make a instance from this class if there is not any object of this class in memory if(instance == null) { instance = new BankManager(); balance = AccountConstants.DEFAULT_BALANCE; currentBalance = 0; } return instance;
        Returns:
        BankManager
